abstract: Tennis careers of Czech twins Karolina and Kristyna Pliskova are diverging after both made strong showing as junior challengers; Karolina holds 20th overall ranking, and has advanced to women's second round of Australian Open, while 131st-ranked Kristyna was eliminated in qualifying round; other twins in tennis history have also had disparate results.
lead_paragraph: The singles careers of Karolina Pliskova, who advanced to the second round of the Australian Open, and her identical twin, Kristyna, who lost in the qualifying tournament, have diverged.
snippet: The singles careers of Karolina Pliskova, who advanced to the second round of the Australian Open, and her identical twin, Kristyna, who lost in the qualifying tournament, have diverged.

headline.main: The Ups and Downs of Tennis Doubles Who Go It Alone
headline.seo: Karolina and Kristyna Pliskova Are Latest Twins With Different Paths
headline.print_headline: For Tennis Twins, Sometimes Two Is Better Than One
